籤詩版本二:
Xa iintshukumo zechess zomdlali ochasayo zifanelekile, umdlalo omnyama nomhlophe awunqunywanga.
Sonke siyazi ukuba uloyiso okanye ukoyiswa ngenxa yenyathelo elinye, kufuneka sizifundise ukwenza iingcebiso ezilungileyo.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokudibana nomchasi.
Kulungile ukusebenzisa amalungu kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Iminqweno kunye neengcinga. Nje ngokuba Go. Uloyiso ekugqibeleni. Kucetyiswa ukuba kusetyenziswe ubuqhetseba.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jiang Wei kunye noluhlu lwedabi likaDeng Ai
Ngexesha loBukumkani obuThathu, iJiang Wei (Shu) kunye neDeng Ai (Wei)
Le mikhosi mibini yadibana eQishan yaza yalwa yodwa ngokwamanqwanqwa. Yomibini imikhosi ye-Wei neyamaShu yajongana notshaba ekubunjweni kweBagua.Xa le mikhosi mibini isisilwa, uJiang Wei wawangawangisa iflegi yakhe waza wakhwaza, yaye ukusekwa kweBagua kwaguquka ngoko nangoko kwaba ngumhlaba omde ogobileyo wenyoka, erhintyela uDeng Ai. Kamva wahlangulwa nguSima Wang.
(Ngokwezekeliso, xa ujongene nemeko enzima, kufuneka usebenzise ubulumko.)
聖意: Usapho kunye nekhaya lizinzile, ukuzinza kuzinzile, ishishini liyaphumelela, umtshato awulungelelaniswa, umhambi ngeenyawo waseLiujia uvimba intsimi, i-silkworms kunye nemfuyo yonakalisiwe, ukukhangela kuvaliwe, isimangalo sifanelekile kwaye ukufuduka. iyalondoloza, impahla elahlekileyo ayinanto, isifo sithandazela ukukhuselwa, ingcwaba lentaba liyalondoloza
古人: Jiang Wei kunye Deng Ai ukulwa idabi
